Position The hotel is located close to the main railway station and the exhibition centre, and is easy to reach from the airport and the motorway. Just a few steps away is Via Indipendenza, one of the city’s most famous streets, leading to Piazza Maggiore, the city’s main square, and the elegant, narrow streets of the old city centre.
